rules_text:
If it was played from you hand, this land enters tapped with two counters on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from this land: Add one mana of any color.
Unearth–Pay 3 life. [i](Pay 3 life: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
ARTed

T, Remove a charge counter from this land: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on this land, sacrifice it.
